text: Ripon [ɹɪpɘn] is a city in Fond du Lac County, Wisconsin, United States. The population was 7,863 at the 2020 census. Ripon is often called the "Birthplace of the Republican Party" because this is where the political party was founded. ==References== Category:Cities in Wisconsin Category:Fond du Lac County, Wisconsin
title: Ripon, Wisconsin
